beer.beer_description: It’s that time of year to get cold, Fresh and wild. A deadly Crisp body to help show case beautiful Freestyle Nelson Sauvin & the freshest Garston Motueka. A clean lager ferment lifts layers of white grape, gooseberry and candied citrus, all rounded out with some surprising old school bitterness! That’s wild!

items.badge_description: It takes the perfect amount of light, the right framing and a touch of creative love to get the perfect picture of your brew. Now it’s time to drink it! That's 425 check-ins with a photo.  Try 5 more for Level 86!

beer.beer_description: It’s that time of year to get cold, Fresh and wild. A deadly Crisp body to help show case beautiful Freestyle Nelson Sauvin & the freshest Garston Motueka. A clean lager ferment lifts layers of white grape, gooseberry and candied citrus, all rounded out with some surprising old school bitterness! That’s wild!

items.badge_description: Guess what? We’re officially 14! From October 22nd to October 27th, we’re celebrating Untappd’s 14th anniversary (woo woo)! Thanks to every one of you for making this beautifully diverse community what it is today! Let’s raise our glasses, check in a brew, earn this badge, and cheers to the next 14 years of memories with you! For extra credit, be sure to check out the latest Hop Culture piece on the beers with most 5-star check-ins on Untappd so far in 2024.

Looking for more kick than a session beer, but want to be able to stay for a few rounds? You have to keep it in the middle. That's 210 beers with an ABV greater than 5% and less than 10%. Try 5 more for Level 43!
We believe in IPA and you should too. You certainly have a taste for the hops! That's 150 different IPAs. Try 5 more for Level 31! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

Kiwis, rugby and sheep aren’t the only things New Zealand has to offer. There’s a ton of great beers in a variety of styles just waiting for you to explore! That's 250 different beers from a brewery in New Zealand. Try 5 more for Level 51!

beer.beer_description: It’s that time of year to get cold, Fresh and wild. A deadly Crisp body to help show case beautiful Freestyle Nelson Sauvin & the freshest Garston Motueka. A clean lager ferment lifts layers of white grape, gooseberry and candied citrus, all rounded out with some surprising old school bitterness! That’s wild!

user.bio:
In wine there is wisdom, in beer there is freedom, in water there is bacteria 
~ Benjamin Franklin

items.badge_description: Put down those cases of Ale Yeast because unlike other IPA styles, the Cold IPA and IPL are brewed with Lager Yeast and a generous amount of hops. When you want a punch of hops with a lighter finish, reach for a Cold IPA or India Pale Lager. That's 5 different beers with the style of IPA - Cold or Lager - IPL (India Pale Lager). Try 5 more or Level 2!

Kiwis, rugby and sheep aren’t the only things New Zealand has to offer. There’s a ton of great beers in a variety of styles just waiting for you to explore! That's 35 different beers from a brewery in New Zealand. Try 5 more for Level 8.

items.badge_description: Supporting local breweries is what helps the craft beer scene grow. You obviously know this since you’re enjoying the local flavor! Be sure to always drink locally.

Round and round the wheel goes! Which style you’ll be drinking, nobody knows! Your desire to explore different styles is inspiring. Keep it up! That's a check-in to at least 10 different styles. Try 5 more for Level 3!

items.badge_description: Fresh from the tap is one of the best ways to enjoy a beer. Just try to use a glass and not drink directly from the tap, as tempting as it may be. That's 250 checkins with the serving style of Draft. Try 5 more for Level 51!
We believe in IPA and you should too. You certainly have a taste for the hops! That's 140 different IPAs. Try 5 more for Level 29! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

items.badge_description: Your quest to quench your thirst leaves no stone unturned! That's at least 25 distinct venues!

Wine isn't the only beverage worthy of pairing with a delicious meal. With so many styles widely available, there’s a perfect pint for any cuisine of your choosing. That's a beer at 10 different venues categorized as a Restaurant. Try 5 more for Level 3!

There's beer in them thar hills! You're setting off on your journey through the world of beer, but be sure to take a little time to get to know each brewery as you go. That's a beer from 30 different breweries. Try 5 more for Level 7!
We believe in IPA and you should too. You certainly have a taste for the hops! That's 5 different IPAs. Try 5 more for Level 2! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast
